outputs.output_descr:
1. To undertake a baseline assessment regarding patterns of recource and land use.
2. To undertake a baseline survey of the level of community satisfaction with the village mechanims for allocation of land and resources.
3. To undertake a baseline survey of the level of community satisfaction with villages mechanisms for conflict resolution
4. To compile a list of experiences in Alternative incomeGeneration (AIG) in Samoa, paying particular attention to opportunities, constraints, technical and financial requirements and expected returns.
